ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.description: Simplifying mentorship into open conversations. Anyone can share their experience with those seeking it, always for free.

whyWeStarted.title: Why We Started
whyWeStarted.paragraph1: Menvo was born from a simple idea: everyone deserves access to mentorship, regardless of their background or financial situation. We believe that sharing knowledge and experiences can transform lives and communities.
whyWeStarted.paragraph2: Our founder experienced firsthand the impact that good mentorship can have on personal and professional growth. However, they also saw how mentorship opportunities were often limited to those with existing connections or financial resources.
whyWeStarted.paragraph3: That's why we created a platform that makes mentorship accessible to all, connecting those who seek guidance with those willing to share their experience â€“ completely free of charge.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions

q1.question: Is mentorship really free?
q1.answer: Yes, all mentorship sessions on our platform are completely free. Our mentors volunteer their time to help others grow and develop.

q2.question: How long are mentorship sessions?
q2.answer: Standard mentorship sessions are 45 minutes long. This provides enough time for meaningful conversation while respecting everyone's schedules.

q3.question: How often can I meet with a mentor?
q3.answer: This depends on the mentor's availability and preferences. Some mentors are open to regular sessions, while others may prefer one-time meetings.

q4.question: What happens if I need to cancel?
q4.answer: We ask that you cancel at least 24 hours in advance out of respect for the mentor's time. You can easily reschedule through your dashboard.

q5.question: How do I become a verified mentor?
q5.answer: After creating your mentor profile, you'll need to schedule a brief verification call with our team. This helps ensure the quality and safety of our community.

q6.question: Is my information secure?
q6.answer: Yes, we take privacy and security seriously. Your personal information is protected and only shared with those you choose to connect with.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your data at Menvo.

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.text: We collect information you provide when creating an account, such as name, email, profile photo, and professional details. We also collect social login data (Google, GitHub, LinkedIn) if you choose to authenticate with these platforms.

email.title: Emails & Communication
email.text: We use your email for essential communications, mentorship notifications, and updates. Emails are sent via Brevo, respecting your privacy and opt-out preferences.

photos.title: Photos & Visual Content
photos.text: Profile photos and uploaded images are securely stored in Supabase and used only for identification and profile personalization.

storage.title: Data Storage
storage.text: All data is securely stored in Supabase, with access restricted to the Menvo team and following best security practices.

mentorship.title: Mentorship & Interactions
mentorship.text: Information about mentorship sessions, reviews, and messages is used to improve the experience and ensure community safety.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services
thirdParty.text: We use third-party services such as Google, GitHub, LinkedIn (login), Supabase (storage), and Brevo (emails). Each service has its own privacy policy.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.text: You may request access, correction, or deletion of your data at any time. Contact us for assistance.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text: Questions about privacy? Contact us at contato@menvo.com.

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: We use cookies to enhance your experience, ensure essential features, and analyze platform usage.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.text: Required for site operation, authentication, and security. Cannot be disabled.

social.title: Social Login
social.text: Cookies may be used for authentication via Google, GitHub, and LinkedIn, enabling secure login.

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.text: We store your language and settings preferences to personalize your experience.

analytics.title: Analytics & Performance
analytics.text: We use cookies to understand how the platform is used and to improve our services.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using Menvo, you agree to these terms. Please read carefully to understand your rights and responsibilities.

usage.title: Platform Usage
usage.text: Menvo connects mentors and mentees for free sessions. Use must be respectful and in accordance with applicable laws.

account.title: Account & Social Login
account.text: You may create an account via email or social login (Google, GitHub, LinkedIn). Keep your credentials secure and do not share your account.

security.title: Security
security.text: We take measures to protect your data, but you are also responsible for keeping your password secure.

content.title: Content & Photos
content.text: You are responsible for content you upload (photos, text). Do not upload offensive or copyrighted content without permission.

communication.title: Communication & Emails
communication.text: We will send important communications about mentorships and updates. You may opt out of promotional emails.

storage.title: Storage & Third Parties
storage.text: Data is stored in Supabase and emails are sent via Brevo. We use third-party social login.

rights.title: Rights & Responsibilities
rights.text: You may access and delete your data. Misuse of the platform may result in account suspension.
